name: Elephantidae Gastropod Mollusc
description:
This experience is about being a strange creature,  half  slug and half elephant,  an hostile mountain dessert.

The player controls the creature by performing sit-ups wearing a card-board. ( Yeah like real physical movement.... like real life stuff .... really ...  If you dont like sports maybe you find someone to do that part for you. )

The whole concept was originally intended as a piece of art ... but is perceived more like kind of a sports app by many.  I  started working on it several years ago and still  improve it occasionally. It is really hard to get testers for this so the calibration might not be optimal.

If you have trouble getting it to run or need builds for other platforms let me know.  

The desktop application is only meant as a visualizer for the corresponding android cardboard app. Please make sure your Android phone and your PC are in the same network and Port 5000 is not blocked in your network.
